contentList.content: Your weapon deals an additional [1] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banishes</LSTag> your target to another plane of existence.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDING_SMITE_BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> your target.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.

The affected entity sheds light in a [1] radius, preventing it from becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>. Incoming attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and possibly marks your target with light, preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Engulf your weapon in Sel√ªne's light, dealing an additional [1] and inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LUNAR_SMITE">Holy Flame</LSTag> on a hit: creature takes [2] every turn.
Attack deals an additional [1] and the Holy Fire deals an additional [2] per level.

Affected entity takes [1] every turn, until the turn after it succeeds a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. Fiends and undead take an extra [1] in addition to the initial damage.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and engulfs your target in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LUNAR_SMITE">Holy Flames</LSTag>.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and sets your target on fire, dealing [2] every turn.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.

Possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STAGGERING_SMITE">Stagger</LSTag> your target. It is stunned and can't move or take <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Actions</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STAGGERING_SMITE">Stagger</LSTag> your target.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and pushes your target [2] away and possibly knocks it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.

Possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WRATHFUL_SMITE">Frighten</LSTag> your target. They'll have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and be unable to move.
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and you possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WRATHFUL_SMITE">Frighten</LSTag> your target.
This reaction won't trigger on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
This reaction only triggers when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
